item.title: Apple Announces $500 Million Commitment to Buying American Magnets
item.description: Apple today announced a $500 million multi-year commitment to buying American-made rare earth magnets developed by MP Materials, at a state-of-the-art factory in Fort Worth, Texas. Apple said the
